mapper.insert: insert into city.batch(num, , ques_id, track_id, rule_id, work_id, expert_id, work_expert, expert_work, start_date, end_date, is_aveg, is_max, match_task) values (#{num}, #{ques_id}, #{track_id}, #{rule_id}, #{work_id}, #{expert_id}, #{work_expert}, #{expert_work}, #{start_date}, #{end_date}, #{is_aveg}, #{is_max}, #{match_task})
